headline: Figma’s Pursuit of Long-Term Backers Kept IPO Price in Check
summary: (Bloomberg) -- Figma Inc.’s record-breaking debut gains are cooling, but they have still handed a windfall to investors including the select institutions that were able to get their hands on the IPO shares, sparking debate over whether the stock was priced too low. headline: 3 Quality Compounders with Exciting Potential
summary: Quality compounders are flywheels. Said differently, they’re businesses that generate heaps of profits and consistently reinvest them to produce even more profits. Rinse and repeat.
